title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.99 - Donated commodities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.99 - Donated commodities

State Regulations

Gifts of supplies and other materials, such as medicines, blood, linen and office supplies, which are normally purchased by the
institution, and are recorded on the books at their fair market value at the
time of donation, regardless of when actual receipt takes
place. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.99

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
